briefTitle: Detection and Analysis of MBC With Heterogeneous ER Expression
officialTitle: Chemotherapy Versus Endocrine Therapy in Metastatic Breast Cancer Patients With Heterogeneous Estrogen Receptor Expression
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients received 18F-FES PET/CT in Fudan University Shanghai Cancer Center from 2017-2021.
* Patients had both FES positive (FES+) and negative (FES-) lesions in FES exam.
* Patients received further treatment.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Incomplete medical records.
